${modID}:Turret.NAME: Turret
DESCRIPTION: End of turn: If you have Material, Consume 1 Material and deal !P! damage to a random enemy. NL Evoke: Deal !E! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Miner.NAME: Miner
DESCRIPTION: Start of turn: Add !P! Material to your hand. NL Evoke: Add !E! Material to your hand.

${modID}:LandMine.NAME: Build Land Mine
DESCRIPTION: End of turn: If any enemy intends to attack, Evoke this. NL Evoke: Deal !E! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.
